scan_table_check.description: UI Actions can be configured to run completely server-side or to trigger a client-sided script (by setting the field "client" to "true"). In that case a callback function needs to be specified in the field "OnClick". It may be tempting to call the function "onClick". However, this may lead to collisions. If two UI Actions (which are active on the same form or list view) define the same function name, one function may just replace the other as both functions exist in the same namespace. As a result, when a UI action is invoked by the user, random behavior is the result - as either of the two functions may get executed.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - UI Action must have a unique onClick function
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Change the function so that it is unique across all defined client UI actions in the system.
scan_table_check.short_description: Client-side UI Actions must use unique onClick function name to avoid collisions
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - UI Action must have a unique onClick function
